Leon Cortez https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leon_Cortez 0 Leon Cortez (27 May 1898 – 31 December 1970) was a British musician and actor who appeared regularly on stage and in films and television in a career that spanned five decades. Leon_Cortez ( 27_May_1898 – 31_December_1970 ) was a_British_musician and actor who appeared regularly on stage and in films_and_television in a_career that spanned five_decades .
